content.prompt: The growth of manufacturing in the United States from 1800 to 1850 was most directly connected to which of the following broader historical processes?

choices.label: Abolitionists advancing moral arguments to bring an end to slavery
Political parties debating about the need for a national bank
Supreme Court decisions confirming the primacy of federal laws over state laws
Large numbers of international migrants moving to northern cities

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
